item.title: Transparent videos from Blender to the web
item.description: Get transparent videos out of Blender and onto the web A quick guide to get your cool render out of Blender and onto the web, with transparency/alpha! Out of Blender For renders to intermediate frame images you can use the following Blender settings in the Properties Editor: Render > Film > Transparent (check it) Output > Output > File Format > PNG Output > Output > Color > RGBA For a small renders directly to video files (bad practice) I used the following settings:
